name: 2024 7th International Conference on Signal Processing and Machine Learning
content: Accepted papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1719-2), which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
organizers: Shandong University of Science and Technology
